URI Cooperative Extension‎URI School Garden Conference
October 19, 2018 at 2:21 PM ·

🌿 Registration for the School Garden Conference has been extended until Monday, October 22 at noon!! 🌿

Take home ideas for easy and inexpensive tools that’ll enhance your educational materials in and out of the classroom. Set your school up for success by planning and planting a garden that aligns with state education standards while also providing endless learning opportunities for your students. Join us on October 27th to collaborate in a workshop, network, and exchange ideas with other attendees!

Don't miss out and REGISTER NOW! For additional details and registration, visit our official website: https://web.uri.edu/sgi/conference/?fbclid=IwAR0QEZid9XmYRerif3cgMmi1htzGrm0E-mFHF8T3nqWOtxFL9U_nKzO95o4
